text:
[Verse]
Sunset sky so bright
Colors paint the night
Dreams take flight
Everything's just right

[Verse 2]
Stars begin to glow
Winds start to blow
In this twilight show
Time moves slow

[Chorus]
Sunsets and dreams
Nothing's as it seems
World of endless themes
Sunsets and dreams

[Verse 3]
Shadows start to play
Heart begins to sway
Night turns into day
Chasing dreams away

[Verse 4]
Magic in the air
Moments that we share
Life beyond compare
Without a single care

[Chorus]
Sunsets and dreams
Nothing's as it seems
World of endless themes
Sunsets and dreams
title: Sunsets and Dreams
